variant.question: Describe the main role of the World Meteorological Organisation (WMO), with regard to aviation.

options.text: Establish and implement, together with ICAO, a global regulatory framework for aviation meteorological services.
Provide global forecasts of upper winds and temperature for flights throughout the world.
Maintain watch over meteorological conditions affecting flight operations within specific areas of responsibility
Provide detailed information about  the most serious meteorological hazards for aviation, globally, including volcanic ash clouds and tropical cyclones.
